column3: The longer we're dug in here, the harder my job gets. Piping hot stew might do the trick for a time, but a body needs variety, and my resources are limited.

I heard about that mess with the proto-aetheryte. Everyone did. Lot of sullen faces these days. I do what I can to raise their spirits, but as soon as they head back out the door, they're back to thinking about the expedition's future...

Maybe it's just wishful thinking, but lately everyone seems to be in higher spirits. Don't know if someone figured out how to deal with our recent setbacks─or maybe my latest culinary experiments have been making a difference?
